GenericExceptionMessage: United data services are not currently available.
MyCheckedBagServiceChargesDesc: Checked baggage service charges are collected at any point in the itinerary where bags are checked. The bag service charges above reflect a maximum outside linear dimension of 62 inches (157 cm). Baggage service charges are per traveler as listed above.
AdditionalOtherBagFeeNote: Bags exceeding size/weight restrictions listed here will not be accepted as checked baggage.
DefaultCheckInBagDimensions: Up to 62 linear inches (157 cm)L + W + H and 50 lbs (23 kg) per bag
BaggageInfoErrorMessage: The traveler information entered does not match our record. Please revise the traveler’s name, the account number or both.
DOTBaggageFAQs: Who is exempt from the baggage service charge?~Please see the baggage service charge exceptions section of the Checked Baggage Service Charges page.|Are the checked bag charges per passenger?~Yes. For example, a family of four traveling on the same reservation will be charged for each of their first checked bags, one each per passenger.  Each second bag per passenger will be assessed the applicable fee.|Do the checked bag services charges also apply to customers on United Express flights?~Yes, this policy applies to all United Express flights.
PNRLookUp: We were unable to verify the information entered. Please check and re-enter your information.

invalidSession.Message: Your session expired because of inactivity.
invalidSession.Title: Login expired

DOTBaggageGenericExceptionMessage: No Baggage Information available at this time.
ChaseFOPTextMessage: These amounts represent an estimate of the first and second checked baggage service charges that may apply to your itinerary. If your itinerary contains multiple travelers, the service charges may vary by traveler, depending on status or memberships.
DOTBaggageAdditionalDetailsTitle2_Econom: Bag charges may vary depending on fare type
NonELFVersionMessage: A newer version of the United Airlines app is available. Please update to the new version to continue.
Booking2OGenericExceptionMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
BookingSessionExpiryMessage: Sorry to have you start over, but your session timed out. Please begin your search again.
GeneralSessionExpiryMessage: We seem to be having some connection issues. Please try again.

CheckBagMessage.PremierSilver_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your MileagePlus® Premier® status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.PremierGold_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your MileagePlus® Premier® status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.PremierPlatinum_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your MileagePlus® Premier® status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.Premier1K_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your MileagePlus® Premier® status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.GlobalServices_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your MileagePlus® Premier® status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.StarAllianceGold_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your Star Alliance™ Gold status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.StarAllianceSilver_CheckBagMessage: Checked bag service charge waivers are based on your Star Alliance™ Silver status at the time of check-in.
CheckBagMessage.MEC_CheckBagMessage: You must be a MileagePlus® Explorer Cardmember at the time of check-in, and ticket(s) must have been purchased using the Card in order to qualify. This applies to the primary Cardmember and one companion on the reservation.
CheckBagMessage.CCC_CheckBagMessage: You must be a MileagePlus® Club Cardmember at the time of check-in, and ticket(s) must have been purchased using the Card in order to qualify. This applies to the primary Cardmember and one companion on the reservation.
CheckBagMessage.PPC_CheckBagMessage: You must be a Presidental Plus<sup><small>SM</small></sup> Cardmember at the time of check-in, and ticket(s) must have been purchased using the Card in order to qualify. This applies to the primary Cardmember and one companion on the reservation.
CheckBagMessage.MIR_CheckBagMessage: Customers who are active U.S. military members at time of check-in, traveling on official business, qualify for waiver of service charges for up to five checked bags within specified size and weight limits.
CheckBagMessage.MIL_CheckBagMessage: Customers who are active U.S. military members at time of check-in qualify for waiver of service charges for up to three checked bags within specified size and weight limits.
